lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Gripping her holy symbol in one hand, and her morningstar in the other, this time, Pike is ready.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With this knowledge, one thought plays on repeat in her mind: Is she even worthy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Count on Scanlan for a hearty laugh, a rollicking song, and a twinkle in his eye that melts hearts and makes the females swoon.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: But overall, I think I'm quite friendly for a dragonborn!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And when his knack for circumventing adversity isn't enough, (knife scraping) the way of blades the elves schooled him in more than makes up the difference.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This most delightful Dungeon Master Cloak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can find a link in the chat room, or you can go to teespring.com/critical-role and they've got hoodies, girl tees, guy tees. Rock it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha do you want to take it away on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any other announcements we want to make before we jump into the game?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah. Have we talked about something important here, guys? There are these shirts that we need to sell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We literally just talked about that.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Listen, guys, this is something that we need to really discuss, first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love you. I love you!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Just get them, because they're dope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like that you two match, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not telling you anything, but it's very intense!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we talk about the shirts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's get this on the road, then, so we can get into the story.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the party went in search of her, they ended up finding themselves climbing deeper and deeper into the Underdark, a very scary portion of the subterranean world, encountering numerous beasts and talking cellphones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that was where we left off at this point in time, which requires a music change.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have a good number of the party that is still out in the boat that is being towed by Keyleth, currently in shark form.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have fuzz in your hair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No you got it. It's gone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First roll of the night. Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got this. You'll be fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we roll well when it counts.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, but for initiative, we always roll less.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And what have you guys got, initiative-wise?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to stay on the ship?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there anything to tie the rope to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe on the far end, there might be a part of the wall, but it's going to be an awkward hinge, and there's really nowhere to latch--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there something that if I had an adhesive that I could--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, if you have an adhesive, you might be able to stick it to the wall at the far end of the beach-- the cavern wall that you're up against-- but there's nothing actually on the beach floor at all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to attempt to take the piece of rope, place it against the wall, and take an ice shot slightly above the rope and freeze it to the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bullet itself ricochets and spins off into the distance, into the darkness, but you do see left behind, where part of the rock has chiseled from the impact, ice has coalesced and cracked and has, for the time being, held the rope to the edge of the cavern.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm running in, for the rest of my movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog and Vex, what have you got?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you're outside. You can go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is the boat beached on the shore yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rope that the boat is attached to is currently attached to the wall, so it's anchored.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog's in the boat. Clarota, Kima...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "There's no blood being had without me!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You trudge up to the shore, run across the gravel beach, and start heading straight into the cavern after Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings us to Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still on top of the flying carpet, the three of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does one of the ghouls look scarier than the others?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he almost seems to be giving looks and silent commands to the others.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on Hunter's Mark? You're back here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, good. Well, I don't need it because I'm going to Conjure Barrage a cone at them all once he's Hunter's Marked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Barrage a cone? Sounds like an Italian porn guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While I whistle for Trinket to get his butt in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stumbles out of the boat, (sploosh) big splash, and chases after Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, and then I Conjure Barrage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You might have to hop off the flying carpet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we fly the carpet forward?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're currently not in control of the carpet. Tiberius is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I delay until-- what's your initiative?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as all the entities rise up, they all swarm in, rushing around with an unnatural speed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Age ain't slowing them down nothing! Wow. Hi, fellas!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see portions of their jaw dangling, with these sharp, awful blackened teeth that are broken and gnarled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They move (whoosh) with a blur of speed, and they're right up in your face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get out of the middle of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The smell you smelled when you first entered the cavern is now so strong that it's nearly overpowering.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you are taking a claw strike from each of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take seven points of slashing damage, another seven points of slashing damage, and then a ten, so that's a total of 24 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make three constitution saving throws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your entire body is one tense, giant, flexing muscle, and you're unable to shift anywhere from your position.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You won't be able to dodge it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Tiberius and Vex.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How far away am I right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here? I'd say you're approximately--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, I'll move the carpet the minimum distance I have to for her to get in range.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: "This doesn't look good." I cast Obelisk of Stone on my dear friend. (fshh) I'm going to raise him up out of harm's way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thankfully, the actual cavern itself is about 25 feet tall, so it doesn't crush you against the ceiling.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, I only raise it about 20 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you are seemingly out of harm's way from the current undead onslaught.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And then I go, "That was a good idea!" And then I spend three sorcerer points and I hock a fireball (fwoosh) at all those fuckers, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your DC on that is 17, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same damage your Lightning Bolt does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Man, I'm a bad mama jama.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, the force of the explosion also destroys the pillar from underneath.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hold on, as he falls-- do I still have a movement after this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You used your movement to move the carpet, sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like the Tower of Terror.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much bludgeoning damage am I taking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, 1d6, because it's only a 20-foot fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that finishes your turn?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: "Vex, would you finish that bastard off?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll another d6 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Well, there's "no" really anybody else, so I'm going to...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's "no" really anybody else-- I can shoot through my fire thing, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still haven't used it for the day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're sitting on the carpet, you pull out (schwoop, schwoop) and rapidly release two arrows in succession.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I forgot I had bracers on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Well, the bracers only affect your damage, not to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get +2 to all damage rolls with ranged attacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do I do for a critical, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You roll the regular damage, multiply it by two, and then add your modifier at the end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Hunter's Mark on both of those?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (choking noise) It reaches up and breaks off the arrow in the throat, looks towards you, goes to lunge, and as it does, you can see it just collapses on top of his body, no longer moving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to shrug off the rest of this paralyzation, stiffly get up, and find your way out of the rubble.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Sorry, Grog. The fight's over.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Am I close enough to get out of the boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can get out of the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're left out there as a shark as everyone goes inside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go look at the treasure chest.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You guys just handled it like that.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll let you kill everybody next time, Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you lift it up, for a split second you see what looks like a flash of orange energy-- a very familiar one, as suddenly, a secondary fire blast (explosion sound) emanates from the treasure chest itself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you checked for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, who just turned the corner, see this giant explosion, sending you about 20 feet backwards.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome. Good thing you didn't get there in time, Scanlan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that chest ten feet away from me, as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So a reflex saving throw for both of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a thing I can do, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both manage to find a way to dodge most of the impact, but you still both take 14 points of fire damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As a rogue with evasion, if I succeed, it's nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As a twin of a rogue...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 14 points of fire damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know where it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take the brunt of the damage, but not the full damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. Did I destroy the loot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was a set of natural armor that's been completely destroyed by the blast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gathering it up, you find approximately 420 gold pieces.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's that mean? Is that a reference? What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But for everything that was damaged inside the chest, the sword, which would be considered a greatsword, seems to be largely unaffected by the blast, other than a little bit of soot that you had to rub off the blade.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll take it to Grog, because I figure he'll probably be able to use it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She hands you this fantastic sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if it's magic or anything, Grog, so you might want to have Tiberius have a look at it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Hold on, let me check." I take it and I shake it really hard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, here. You can check it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As he's doing that, I get 18 trying to see what's up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a moment to inspect it, and you ascertain the magical nature.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ooh! When you attack a creature with this magic weapon and roll a 20 on the attack roll, after dealing damage, you can immediately make an additional attack for free.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pass that piece of paper over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd be at quite a disadvantage using this weapon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any bodies that we can look at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: looks like it's taken a little bit of damage, but it was once a really pretty diamond.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just going to keep this with the party gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With the party treasury? Oh, sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus one diamond to the treasury.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: "Vex, let me see the diamond for just one second." As he's shaking his sword, I go into the Bag of Holding and take out the Mending Wheel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you turn it back into coal?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's not how it works, Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, the diamond is brought to a solid, undamaged, finely-cut example of a diamond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long has it been since we rested?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rested at the camp after taking out Queen Ulara, so I'd say it's probably been about-- with the travel to get to this point, probably about six hours since you rested.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I perception check around the cave?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And also, while we have a moment, did we ever discern what is in that yellow vial?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, do we know what this is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see from glancing at the glass vial it's contained in, the interior of the glass looks slightly pock-marked, almost like the viscous fluid within has actually damaged the glass slightly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're unable to really ascertain what the nature of the liquid is, but those are the details you can make out, currently.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I went over to Vax's foot again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, come on! Don't! (all laugh)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a little zombie poo on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm getting real tired of your shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled 22 on perception, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Make a medicine check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you had a perception check? What did you roll?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get down into frame! Lower into frame. Pull them down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ladies and gentlemen, we have a bunch of shirts to sell tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try to get a better look at what I saw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It lands down in the center of the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How's my foot doing these days?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your foot is still healing, but unfortunately, based on the medicine roll, it is getting better but not enough to complete the process of you getting all your toes back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I saw that thing out of the corner of my eye and was just distracted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It does look like a flying manta ray.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why couldn't I get that for medicine?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just throwing it out there: still the shark with the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Grog, what was yours again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should be proud of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the top of the round is Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What should we do? Command us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want us to stay?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the hell is it called? My quick action to dash.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I grab her by the scruff and run?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do that, but you'll have no other action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I want to do.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Get on the damn carpet, you fools!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, you guys would be able to get onto the carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?! Why would a giant winged-thing fly?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: laughs) He looks like he flies, guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait! Can we have an aerial battle over water? Let's do it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are in the cavern.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I started heading back to the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you did? Then yeah, you're still out by the boat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm getting the boat ready to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take the butt of your gun and you start bashing against the ice that you set against the wall. It cracks, and eventually you get the rope free from the side of the wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm bringing the boat around so that people can get on really quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That brings us to Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Passing as many people as I can!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I say rage run and barbarian speed, you're going to get nearly completely out of the cavern.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: His knees are really high in the air!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth! Are you staying out in shark form at the boat?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh wow, I'm up so soon! Okay, I'm going to start running!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's rough for you to get around because of your size and the terrain.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I jump on his leg or back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage, because you're in full-plate armor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing's free! (laughing) You've got to roll for everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What's your strength? What was your athletics? Total.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My athletics is a one, total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, I want you to make a--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My athletics is a one, so doesn't that make me nine?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was good, because I was going to let it go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just see shadows in the cavern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holding your axe in one hand and your greatsword in the other, just (panicked screaming).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The large, ray-like, cloaked creature swoops down towards the top of the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We've got to get out of here!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a good thing we ran!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's just going to attack us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just gave up a turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, it comes out and sinks its teeth into your form, across your shoulder area, and it bites down. You end up taking--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the creature wraps around you, (squelch) completely envelops you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The air is not able to get to you at this time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So because of the disadvantage, it does not make its save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Roll the damage for your fire breath.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Depends on your level, as a dragonborn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me pull it up real fast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If only there was a way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If there was some book that had all this information available.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some ancient tome which suddenly answers everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear this muffled (screeching) sound as it keeps, still tight around his head, fighting through the damage and maintaining its hold on him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't spend all your sorcerer's points!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: five sorcerer points to cast Telekinesis and (blast sound) fling it off me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to do a contested roll on this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like arm wrestling with dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll a d20, add five to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The creature is detached and thrown back at that point of the wall, off of you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (grunts) Good! I use my movement to get the hell out of there! (grunts)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. They move out that way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not my turn yet! Tell him to go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, are you staying on the carpet? Anything else you want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait! Is Pike off the carpet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike's laying in the dirt right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I just hold her really tight, and I sniff her hair, and it smells like strawberries.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Got to make it weird, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I Dimension Door us to the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Scanlan grabs you and holds you for a second, for a moment you're confused, and you hear that strange shrieking moan in the distance, and suddenly the darkness gives way to this flash of purple arcane energy, and the two of you (boof) fall a few inches into hard wood, and you feel the boat rock for a second as you're now on the outside in the boat, being tugged by Keyleth the shark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you staying on the carpet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I jump off the carpet, climb on Trinket, and we take off!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she goes, "Go, go, go, go!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, for the time being, we'll say you guys manage to (whoosh) make your way outside of the cavern to the ship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you go? Oh, you're a shark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wonder how far this thing can fly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we'll find out real quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys all get into the boat--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing) Follow the Macy's Day balloon shark.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shushing) This is the craziest thing ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Keyleth begins to pull away, the boat picks up speed into the water, and you hear that moan sound begin to get louder as the creature (swoosh) out of the cavern, giving chase.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so! For the purposes of this--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've been waiting to use this!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a James Bond water chase! (all laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I throw a dagger at the McRay there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Due to its distance, the darkness behind it, and the fact that you are in a boat, you are at a disadvantage on both your attack rolls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus I had a one on the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you super miss on that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And for a moment, you swear you see two more appear at its sides.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, with Bad News, I'm sitting down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are at disadvantage for this shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm at advantage for this shot!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For a second there, you all feel like it's going to list and take on water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we all on the boat, or are some people still on the carpet?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, a bunch of people are on the carpet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't all fit in the boat! That's why we didn't all take the boat originally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius is still on the carpet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're the only one still on the carpet, then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: By the way, if anyone wants to make us a little six-square carpet, that would be awesome!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If someone crocheted us a little single-square magic carpet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we could put it on our little floaty deal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 40ish feet away, at an angle, so it's about 50 feet away from you, up in the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long is that chain on the axe?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was going to do something else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try and shift your weight to the back of the boat and get closer with your movement, if you want.

lines.text: "We choose the grounds in which we attack, "and we choose the methods in which we set the battlefield."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could try to just draw him out somehow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is glass on the top, so we could try to Sunlight the head?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have something called Divine Intervention.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You can call on your deity, and you roll a percentile die, and you can have them help you with something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So is it possible to try to get her help before we do this? Or is it something that you have to do on the spot?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know, because this is new.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can attempt it once a day, and once it works, it can't be done for another week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So if we attempt it, then she can intervene? She can be on our side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And if you succeed-- you have a 10% chance of success-- in some divine way, Sarenrae will guide power or aid to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you wait on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Once we know what we're doing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, let's wait until we know what we're doing.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It all goes downward, correct? He's all up in a pit, yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's in the top of a pyramid.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, that won't help me at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we should go for the top.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How would we free the prisoners, first of all?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's that beehive structure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to take out the metal thingy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So how do we do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we destroy the beehive structure at the top.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we destroy the structure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the only option that seems open to us, unless we keep stumbling around and looking for some other way, I think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't have any kind of corruption spell that ages things?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we've got the acid thing, and maybe Grog can--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we hit it with Dispel Magic, maybe get your goddess's aid-- hit it with Dispel Magic, hit it with corruption, rust the shit, and then it falls!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can Scanlan mercilessly mock the top of the thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have several vials of acid, actually.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can you take the normal acid and could we make it magical?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, extra bad? We don't even know what it does yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That way, after the acid has--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought about making an acid arrow. I really did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He could throw a big boulder to collapse it the rest of the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Question. You built a bomb before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we could hole up for-- months or weeks, was it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It took me months to figure out how to build.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now that you know how to build one, would it be quicker?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, the bomb we just threw in that room?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've made one, I can make another.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say your materials are very limited.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. At this point, though, if I had a workshop, I could--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll get closer, we'll rest for the night, and maybe send in a snooping party.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My sister says that island is crawling with nasty shits.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll stay up, because we're good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealth in, spy, get an idea of--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Inspect the top of the building, see where the acid would be put to good use.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, see what kind of magic is being held on top of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're guessing that K'Varn doesn't want to leave his little cubby-hole.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He probably doesn't want to leave the top of the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's going to come a point where chaos is just going to descend on us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're also forgetting that the second that he sees us or we get close enough, he could control all of our minds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wasn't the point of us going to these beaches to try to see if there was any other advantage we could find?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We were trying to find clues so that maybe scrying would be helpful, which it was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if you go and hug one of the beams and Dimension Door the beam out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think I can do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can banish a being, but not a beam.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't cast a portal on the door and make it fall?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we've been here, and we've been here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go to one more beach before we all die?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here, or here, or this little nubbin right here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those are just more things to fight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that's true, but my sister studied the island, and she sensed the presence of things everywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clustered mainly in the city region.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's no need for us to relocate now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we see this from the beach we're on? What is this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this distance, it's hard to make out any sort of visual.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That could be where we stage our attack from.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go take over a little shanty-town.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can do reconnaissance from there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can do reconnaissance from where we are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said there's something swimming down there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's literally never been a problem.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can we all fit on the magic carpet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can also do two trips on the carpet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we're not all going for reconnaissance, are we?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If something goes wrong, though, it's going to be-- I would rather something go wrong with all of us than something go wrong with half of us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't know what to do, so why don't Vex and I and Scanlan go for a little ride and check out the tip of this island?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't want to be split up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's at least get on the island.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, well, then you guys go check it out first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll get in the boat and we'll start heading there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we getting on the boat or doing the carpet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we can't all fit on the carpet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have the earrings that Tibber-hoods crafted for us, so we can tell you what we see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let the quiet ones go have a look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just to make sure it's not crawling with baddies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just went through some shit, Keyleth.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You guys are going on the carpet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to take the boat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll paddle the boat towards the island.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I haven't figured it out yet, because I don't know what that is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know that thing a dog does when it pulls its butt along the floor?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I could cast Pass Without a Trace so everybody gets +10 to their stealth rolls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So who's in the boat with me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we're going over? By boat? Is that what's happening?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we start paddling in the boat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about Kima and Clarota? Clarota should go with us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can Clarota be on the carpet, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can have him alongside the carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Percy, you're on the boat as well?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are the rest of us flying? We're flying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Clarota, I'm sure we've asked this before and I wasn't here because I missed a part of a thing? What about your hat? What does it do? Can you make more of them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He said no, it would take a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to attempt to attach the skin to the bottom of the carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the bottom of the carpet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's not twiddle our thumbs for too long.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just going to try and sew it on the corners.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make a roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you take a little bit of your thick, heavy leather thread, the stuff that you use for something, and you loosely attach it to the bottom of the carpet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get your mother a shirt. Keep going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so we're over the water?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The boat's going too. We're fucking fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as Grog's pulling along-- make an athletics check, by the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, about to smash you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would also like Grog to make a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a natural 20 on stealth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've got Pass Without a Trace also.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Landfall hits you on the other side of the beach, apparently not disturbing whatever lies beneath the surface.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I immediately hop out, pull the boat up just to beach the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's cliffs on both sides of this beach, and as the incline increases up about maybe 500, 600 feet from where you are, you can see what looks like a few buildings or rubble of what was a small gathering of structures.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we check out the thing in the air?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there a larger one behind those smaller structures?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you're seeing now is this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any of those crazy trees you mentioned before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's almost like a cluster of weird fungus-like vines that drift from the top surface, and the trees unnaturally sway in place, almost like they have a rhythm to their movement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Clarota, will those trees attack us? Are they living and attack-y?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They feed off of the essence of it "and they provide food for other things that live here."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We feed our captives, our slaves of the colony, "with the fungal essence of the tree."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Other creatures? Don't skimp on the details, it's only our lives.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And my people, which are in turn under the influence of K'Varn."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But as you're from this island, what wildlife can we expect to run into here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But the dangers lie in the spores that wander the forests."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm picturing a big yellow thing with little legs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take the cask of ale out of the Bag of Holding and pour him a little glass of ale, and I'm like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you know what, Grog, I hate to tell you this--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you care for some ale?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no need for such false sustenance."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we go inspect those structures up there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I grab Scanlan by the scruff of the neck and nod at my sister.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go take a peek, yes? We'll take a peek. Just wait a minute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I actually go collect a few of the vines hanging from the trees.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a nature check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: General perception check on the beach as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up an incline, and the forest starts adjacent to the structure where they're going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can make a stealth check to make your way there, if you'd like.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought we were next to a tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, most of the forest starts further up this incline as the island itself begins to level off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we make our way up to the structure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get advantage on your roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it our old stealth check? Can I use my flying stealth check? Damn it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, plus two! That makes it five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus ten. Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're getting better! Plus my inspiration from paddling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There isn't a rigidity to any of these walls, and the buildings themselves almost seem to sag, or they sit or rest at a strange, unnatural angle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see what looks to be a pile of furs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There looks to be a large bedroll made of patchwork furs, but the pile itself is huge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it looks twice the size of what I would use for a fire, or what I would use for a bedroll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three times, even, which means it houses a lot of individuals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're taking this look, too, as you guys are having this visual, you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a slight rumble in the ground and what sounds like a footfall, and as you glance over your shoulder, you can see what looks to be some sort of towering humanoid dragging something behind it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) There are giants in the sky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see it standing probably close to 15, 20 feet in height as it begins lumbering up (krsh krsh krsh) towards you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, should we hide? Can we try to hide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you were stealthed as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I do insight and see if it seems like a bad guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make an insight check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I'm just checking to see if he's a misunderstood guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I see him? Can I do a simple recognize check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All you guys are staying back at the beach while they're checking.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Both of you have got earrings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it begins to step forward, it drops whatever it's holding behind it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm picking up Scanlan and moving backwards.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, can we move into the shadows?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was holding your hand the whole time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But wait, maybe if we sell out the shirts we can go another half-hour or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, how many shirts do we have left?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't make it to K'Varn, didn't make it to the shirts.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: If we meet our goal for the shirts by the time we're done reading--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Then are you guys cool with doing the Q&A?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: All right, I'm just going to try to open this up here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could all be hoodie Twinkies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was the stoner-est thing you've ever said.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll buy a hoodie if you guys buy 19. Deal? Here we go.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I'm trying to load it into Google Docs so we can actually see the messages.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have not the slightest clue where my phone would be.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's probably out in the hallway.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Looks like they start right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guys, let's get some of these read off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's an avid reader, "our D&D group's bard, and a big fan of the show."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hope to do as well as you guys." That's awesome! Zandor, have fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Many thanks for all the time and effort you put into making Critical Role." Well, thank you guys for watching it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're glad you guys like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should do "loins encouraged" and "violence girded," no?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Liam, did you just buy 20 shirts?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A thousand years of Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Speaking of which, I've got to put the cloak on.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It does get warm in here, just a little bit.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Even if we didn't make it, I feel like we had to do the Q&A because there's two $1,000 donations in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We just need to fix that in the opening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On your mother's side or your father's side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me know if you guys want those brooches made."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "P.S: Matt, we need DM tips column/video series."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For serious." I agree. That'd be cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who would voice our characters is my question.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You call your people and we'll call our people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I interject for a second and thank Earl Davis, @Wheelyfactoids, for buying 8 shirts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's awesome! You have Christmas on lock!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Start playing Dungeons & Dragons with them.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I know that we have someone in the chat room-- I'm not sure off the top of my head-- someone bought the entire office shirts.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yeah, they sent a message and asked for everyone's shirt sizes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And remember, Keyleth: fish are friends, not food."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As always, thank you all for coming together "and sharing your adventure with us "and inspiring so many people to begin our own." Thank you, guys. That's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Less than three, all of you." Happy birthday!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, was that a birthday huzzah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here's $5 per episode." You've been doing all the song parodies? Those are awesome!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those are great! Love the song parodies!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, dude! Yeah, those are hilarious.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So wait, there are song parodies? Can we get those?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He did song parodies for Grog and Scanlan.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Send us the link so we'll play them next time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to try to find a way to showcase it on the show, perhaps.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you go to our website, it filters through, but as long as you hashtag Critical Role--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll be able to see it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll be able to find it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll see it, and we're looking for a way to add it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of us are kind of obsessed about checking out the hashtag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I now look forward to Thursdays more than I do Fridays."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Rachel Steiner aka AxisOfAnarchy." Rachel, Happy Birthday!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So thank you, Rachel. Happy Birthday! Cerulean Kestrel donated $50.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thanks to Matt Mercer and crew for a great show "and thank you, David, for introducing me to it."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Congrats on your brother's college graduation. That's great! Scottydsntknw8?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, "Scotty Doesn't Know It." Ah, here we go. That's... very good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Every little helps, I hope." And it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the 826 is going to get such a check from us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Less than three, a Critical Role cosplayer."

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: And all you got was a damn emote, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If someone ends up making a Sarenrae holy symbol for you...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: WeeklyFactoids is the guy who bought 8 shirts!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got an axe. I'll show you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Also, Travis Willingham, "Gazlowe is one of my favorite Heroes of the Storm heroes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's the little goblin that could, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not quite as good as Rehgar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And none of us are as good as Jaina or Illidan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't fuck with grandpa Illidan, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "P.S.: Laura Bailey-- insert harp accompaniment-- "can you please say, 'Eat lightsaber, jerk' "in your best Kira Carsen voice? Love all of you."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keep it up, guys. This is something I look forward to weekly "and it's incredibly entertaining."

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Was that negging? "Slowly fell in love."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He was just courting us at first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a little getting used to us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're in a very fabulous purple coat right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's totally worth it to get up so early for you guys." That's amazing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what that is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I said see you later, see you next time, ta-ta.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Much love to everyone and happy tenth episode." Thank you so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for putting this together." Thank you. That's incredible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And thank you everyone for supporting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we're going to get photos when we present them with the check and we're going to do a whole thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the best first date. It's great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we have a bunch of posters at our house.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've done so well taking girls to 826. I'm not even kidding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I do want a novelty check for when we finally get these donations over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to draw pictures on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much are those novelty checks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Arislan donated $50. That's awesome! "Happy tenth episode, hope you enjoyed your cake." Aw, thank you guys!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you! I'm tweeting your cake right now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The only thing better is your support of 826LA "and I hope my small contribution helps." It really does. Thank you so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You guys are all awesome, "and I will continue to support Critical Role and Geek & Sundry "as long as we all exist." As long as we all exist.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which should be for about one more episode.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is still five hit points to splatter a cat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thanks for your amazing performance." Thank you for your amazing donation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thanks again, everyone. Tristan." Thank you, Tristan.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So we're going to switch over to the dropcam and some music really quick, and we're going to get set up for the Q&A as fast as possible for you guys.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: This is just a couple minutes and we will get set up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we can dance while setting up for the Q&A.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, are we on? Hey, guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much for being ridiculous.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Sam's got to run back to his family.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sam! Text me the change in schedule, if you get a second.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I actually think that's a pretty good time to start winding this down.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: It's been an hour-long Q&A, so I think it's a pretty good time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so we'll get a few more questions here, and then we'll go ahead and close it on this, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you guys noticed how excited we got when we were like, "oh my god, you guys haven't met Gilmore yet." And all of us went, "oh my god. Gilmore." And we all got excited over an NPC.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because for us, Gilmore is real, and Pike is real, which is why we all fucking cried our eyes out when Pike died.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it my imagination that Gilmore is blond, by the way? Does everybody else see Gilmore as very blond?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I pictured Gilmore with black hair.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I pictured him with black hair, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I saw big curly blond hair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I like that! I pictured him with black, slicked-back, greasy hair in a ponytail.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This has been one of my favorite things that I've been a part of... in my life? That's a really bold statement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I feel the same way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I barely believe it's the internet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, look at all the Ashley hearts.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Somebody wanted to know if any of you guys had ever reached god mode status in past D&D campaigns.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But my DM was not very good, so the game got so boring we quit because our DM was weak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We had a good time and left on a cliffhanger, and as long as they want to keep bringing me back to do it occasionally, I'm happy to, so let them know that you enjoyed it and they should have me back, because it was a good time.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to say what my favorite part of D&D is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's your favorite part of D&D, Orion?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He puts up with arguments about spells that I want to make super OP, and he's like, "you can't do that." I'm like, "but why?" Those are our arguments.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't that crazy that it's instantly Clarota and it's instantly Kima? It's not Matt anymore, as soon as it's that character.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So it is that sense of realistic magic that exists every single game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the speed our personal text messages, or group text messages, go at.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Our group text message thread is insane.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The fan art that you guys have been putting out is so amazing.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We're working on getting all of that up on the website. We're working on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I save so many pictures to my phone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have no reason for it, but I scroll through it when I'm by myself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It goes into my iPhone folder, and then right into Dropbox.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You find all the good stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Liam, man, you find so much on the internet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's the winner for finding stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And the rewards that come with it are so fantastic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two quick questions I want to answer real fast, when you're done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One: how did I get into dungeon mastering? By having a really terrible dungeon master.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've been doing it ever since.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You said there were two questions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I forgot what the other one was.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: If you guys could be a different race, what would you be?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I think I would want to be Japanese because it would be a whole different cultural experience.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I thought that's what they meant.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think about what to do once he kills me off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I think I definitely, if I have to re-roll, which I don't ever want to have to do, but I would want to be a tiefling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Token human has been a lot of fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! I also like being a human.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to say, because I'm convinced Matt will kill me eventually, and I don't want to spoil whatever I cook up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we hear your dwarf accent again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha, want to give us an example?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (Swedish accent) Oh, you mean this dwarf?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (same accent) Hello! Hello, welcome to Kraghammer.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I also like what somebody in the chat room said that for Critical Role fans, you could call them Critters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Liam. Thank you, chat.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: The question I think would be good to end out on is, "what would each of you recommend to them to tell their friends to get them into D&D?" How would you recommend other people push D&D onto people?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Live a video game while drinking with your friends.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Which, there isn't anyone as good as Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or be one. That's not true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a really cool improvised story that you all create together.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's just remembering how to do that again with friends.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: That's what you fucking tell people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is to make that high school friend again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Totally. If you can find a group of friends that you can openly play D&D with, without them judging you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Honestly, I didn't know you very well, I didn't know Orion very well, when we started, and now all of us are best friends.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a group of people I see more often than any other group.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, we see each other more than almost anybody else in our lives.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a whole other group of friends.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I see them about once a month, really.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog has a session in the morning.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yeah, so I think that's good.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Thank you, everyone, for getting us to that thousand shirts sold.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You'll only be able to have them within two weeks.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll tweet at you, and then tweet me your PS4 handle, and I'll add you to my friends list and we can play together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sincerely, for watching, for being amazing, and for tuning in to enjoy our silliness.
